title: The lands which fall within the periphery on the north / south direction of the IPCL project complex
clause_text: The lands which fall within the periphery on the north / south direction of the IPCL project complex have been designated as low density residential zone in which residential user may be permitted subject to following conditions -
section: 1.0 LAND USE CLASSIFICATION AND PERMISSIBLE USES

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
